content: SeedlyTV EP05 Investments REITs Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 May 2019How does interest rate fluctuation affect REITs performance?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

RusminLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 24 May 2019A short answer to this would be interest rate affects the borrowing cost since REITs usually take on debt to invest in commercial real estates. So rising interest rate  may cause the cost of borrowing to go up and vice versa.0 comments3
